buildup.text: PISA tests reading, math, and science for 15-year-olds. Countries obsess over rankings; ministers lose jobs over drops.

discovery.text: PISA revealed that money doesn't predict quality. Estonia outspends almost nobody but outperforms almost everyone.

twist.text: Critics say PISA measures a narrow slice of education. Creativity, citizenship, and character aren't on the test.
